document_data.name: Magic Circle Against Alignment
document_data.mainbody: '''''Magic circle against alignment''''' was a [[spell]] which protected a caster from either evil or good alignment.
document_data.Effects: During casting, the caster selected which alignment to defend against. When cast, this spell created an area with a radius of {{SI|11|ft}} around a targeted creature. Within this area, immunity was granted against mind-affecting effects or spells used by the selected alignment. The spell also provided minimal protection against physical attacks from creatures of the selected alignment.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
